meanings.definition: The quality or action of being very generous.
meanings.sent1: Her munificence towards the homeless shelter was truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The king's munificence towards his subjects earned him their loyalty.
meanings.sent3: The billionaire's munificence knew no bounds, as he donated to every cause he came across.
meanings.sent4: Her munificence shone like a beacon of light in the dark world of poverty.
meanings.sent5: The community was in awe of the munificence displayed by the local business owner.

meanings.sent1: The munificence of the charity helped countless families in need.
meanings.sent2: Receiving such munificence from a stranger was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent3: The munificence of the birthday present left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent4: His munificence was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The munificence of her contribution made a significant impact on the community.
